metadata.title: CVE-2014-5209 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.description: An Information Disclosure vulnerability exists in NTP 4.2.7p25 private (mode 6/7) messages via a GET_RESTRICT control message, which could let a malicious user obtain sensitive information.

notes.note: mdeslaur> mode 7 is disabled by default in 4.2.8, marking relevant releases as not-affected

criterions.comment: ntp package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1:4.2.8p12+dfsg-3ubuntu4').
